entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:20 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 in the morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:20 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
